title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XV, pt. 700 - Public Access To Records
content:

State Regulations
§ 700.1 - Purpose and scope
§ 700.2 - Designation of records access officer
§ 700.3 - Requests for records
§ 700.4 - Nonrequired access to records
§ 700.5 - Denial of access to records
§ 700.6 - Appeals
§ 700.7 - Subject matter list
§ 700.8 - Location and hours for public inspections and public notice
§ 700.9 - Fees

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XV, pt. 700

Statutory authority: Public Officers Law, §
87[1]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
